collection:
This
Privacy Policy outlines our practices concerning the collection, use, and
sharing of your information when you use our application.

## Information Collection

  

*At SQL Sage, we believe in minimal data collection.
* Therefore, the only information we collect from you is the URL you provide for processing within our application.
No additional personal information is collected.

## Use of Collected Information

  

The URL you provide is used solely for the purpose of generating a video
digest using our GPT-powered application.
